    • Method Detail

      • setLethalTiles

        public void setLethalTiles(boolean state,
                           int l,
                           int c)
        Sets the lethal tiles of the enemy. If the hero steps into one of this tiles, he dies
        Parameters:
        state - - state of the enemy: asleep/stuned=false, awake=true
        l - - line position of the enemy
        c - - column position of the enemy

        Checks if the hero is killed by the enemy
        Parameters:
        hero -
        Returns:
        returns "true" if the hero was killed
